00089 BOOL CMainFrame::OnCreateClient(LPCREATESTRUCT, CCreateContext* pContext) {
00090         TVisualObject *pTab = new TVisualObject(1,"",pContext,RUNTIME_CLASS(TTabWnd));
00091         view[0] = new TVisualObject(2,"Video",pContext,RUNTIME_CLASS(CNewVisionView));
00092         view[1] = new TVisualObject(3,"Scene", pContext,RUNTIME_CLASS(CNewVisionView));
00093         view[2] = new TVisualObject(4,"Activity", pContext,RUNTIME_CLASS(CNewVisionView));
00094         view[3] = new TVisualObject(5,"Floor",pContext,RUNTIME_CLASS(CNewVisionView));
00095         view[0]->SetIcon(IDI_MEN);
00096         view[1]->SetIcon(IDI_MEN);
00097         view[2]->SetIcon(IDI_MEN);
00098         view[3]->SetIcon(IDI_BALLS);
00099 
00100         imgFramework.Add(pTab);
00101         imgFramework.Add(pTab, view[0]);
00102         imgFramework.Add(pTab, view[1]);
00103         imgFramework.Add(pTab, view[2]);
00104         imgFramework.Add(pTab, view[3]);
00105         
00106         imgFramework.Create(this);
00107         
00108         ((CNewVisionView*)(view[0]->GetWnd()))->m_type = VIDEO_VIEW;
00109         ((CNewVisionView*)(view[1]->GetWnd()))->m_type = SCENE_VIEW;
00110         ((CNewVisionView*)(view[2]->GetWnd()))->m_type = ACTIVITY_VIEW;
00111         ((CNewVisionView*)(view[3]->GetWnd()))->m_type = FLOOR_VIEW;
00112 
00113         return TRUE; 
00114 }

00116 int CMainFrame::OnCreate(LPCREATESTRUCT lpCreateStruct)
00117 {
00118         if (CFrameWnd::OnCreate(lpCreateStruct) == -1)
00119                 return -1;
00120 
00121         EnableDocking(CBRS_ALIGN_ANY);
00122 
00123         // -------------- Add control toolbar -------------- 
00124         if (!m_wndControlToolBar.Create(this, IDD_CONTROL_TOOLBAR,
00125       WS_VISIBLE | CBRS_TOP | CBRS_GRIPPER | CBRS_SIZE_DYNAMIC 
00126           | CBRS_TOOLTIPS | CBRS_FLYBY, IDD_CONTROL_TOOLBAR))
00127         {

00129       return -1;      // Fail to create.
00130         }
00131         // -------------- Add program toolbar -------------- 
00132         if (!m_wndToolBar.CreateEx(this, TBSTYLE_FLAT, WS_CHILD | 
00133         WS_VISIBLE | CBRS_TOP  | CBRS_GRIPPER | 
00134         CBRS_TOOLTIPS | CBRS_FLYBY | CBRS_SIZE_DYNAMIC) ||
00135         !m_wndToolBar.LoadToolBar(IDR_FILE))

00138         return -1; //Failed to create
00139     }
00140     m_wndToolBar.LoadTrueColorToolBar(
00141                 32,
00142         IDB_TOOLBAR_TC,
00143         IDB_TOOLBAR_TC_HOT,
00144                 IDB_TOOLBAR_GR);

00148         WS_VISIBLE | CBRS_TOP  | CBRS_GRIPPER |

00152         return -1; //Failed to create
00153     }

00234 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00235 LRESULT CMainFrame::OnUpdateStatusBar(UINT wParam, LONG lParam) {
00236         CNewVisionDoc* doc = ((CNewVisionDoc*)this->GetActiveDocument());
00237         if (!doc->m_initialized)
00238                 return FALSE;
00239         char s[15];
00240         StringCchPrintf(s, 15, "Frame: %d", doc->trackermodel.m_frameNumber);
00241         m_wndStatusBar.SetPaneText(FRAME_NUMBER_STATUS_POS, s);
00242         return TRUE;
00243 }
00244 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00245 LRESULT CMainFrame::OnUpdateNavigationBar(UINT wParam, LONG lParam) {
00246         CNewVisionDoc* doc = ((CNewVisionDoc*)this->GetActiveDocument());
00247         if (!doc->m_initialized)
00248                 return FALSE;
00249     // Read the current stream position
00250         REFERENCE_TIME rtNow = doc->trackermodel.m_frameNumber;
00251     // Convert position into a percentage value and update slider position
00252         CScrollBar* slider = (CScrollBar*)m_wndTrackToolBar.GetDlgItem(ID_SCROLLER);
00253     if (doc->trackermodel.m_frameTotal != 0)
00254     {
00255                 int minTick, maxTick;
00256                 slider->GetScrollRange(&minTick, &maxTick);
00257                 long lTick = (long)((1.0* rtNow * maxTick) / doc->trackermodel.m_frameTotal);
00258         slider->SetScrollPos(lTick);
00259     }
00260     else
00261         slider->SetScrollPos(0);
00262     
00263     // Update the 'current position' string on the main dialog
00264         int nSeconds = (int)(1.0* rtNow / doc->trackermodel.m_frameRate);
00265     int nMinutes = nSeconds / 60;
00266     nSeconds %= 60;
00267         int allSeconds = (int)(1.0* doc->trackermodel.m_frameTotal / doc->trackermodel.m_frameRate);
00268     int allMinutes = allSeconds / 60;
00269     allSeconds %= 60;
00270         CStatic* pos = (CStatic*)m_wndTrackToolBar.GetDlgItem(ID_POSITION);
00271     // Update the display
00272     TCHAR szPosition[24], szCurrentString[24];
00273     StringCchPrintf(szPosition, 24, _T(" %02d:%02d / %02d:%02d \0"), nMinutes, nSeconds, allMinutes, allSeconds);
00274     // Read current string and compare to the new string.  To prevent flicker,
00275     // don't update this label unless the string has changed.
00276 
00277         pos->GetWindowText(szCurrentString, 24);
00278         if (strcmp(szCurrentString, szPosition))
00279                 pos->SetWindowText(szPosition);
00280         return TRUE;
00281 }

00283 LRESULT CMainFrame::OnUpdateActiveView(UINT wParam, LONG lParam) {
00284         GetActivePane()->Invalidate();
00285         GetActivePane()->UpdateWindow();
00286         return TRUE;
00287 }

00294 LRESULT CMainFrame::OnLoadLastFrame ( WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam )
00295 {
00296         CNewVisionDoc* doc = ((CNewVisionDoc*)this->GetActiveDocument());
00297         if (!doc->m_initialized)
00298                 return FALSE;
00299         doc->LoadLastTrackedFrame();
00300         return TRUE;
00301 }

00342 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00343 void CMainFrame::DockControlBarLeftOf(CControlBar* Bar, CControlBar* LeftOf)
00344 {
00345         CRect rect;
00346         DWORD dw;
00347         UINT n;
00348         
00349         // get MFC to adjust the dimensions of all docked ToolBars
00350         // so that GetWindowRect will be accurate
00351         RecalcLayout(TRUE);
00352         
00353         LeftOf->GetWindowRect(&rect);
00354         rect.OffsetRect(1,0);
00355         dw=LeftOf->GetBarStyle();
00356         n = 0;
00357         n = (dw&CBRS_ALIGN_TOP) ? AFX_IDW_DOCKBAR_TOP : n;
00358         n = (dw&CBRS_ALIGN_BOTTOM && n==0) ? AFX_IDW_DOCKBAR_BOTTOM : n;
00359         n = (dw&CBRS_ALIGN_LEFT && n==0) ? AFX_IDW_DOCKBAR_LEFT : n;
00360         n = (dw&CBRS_ALIGN_RIGHT && n==0) ? AFX_IDW_DOCKBAR_RIGHT : n;
00361         
00362         // When we take the default parameters on rect, DockControlBar will dock
00363         // each Toolbar on a seperate line. By calculating a rectangle, we
00364         // are simulating a Toolbar being dragged to that location and docked.
00365         DockControlBar(Bar,n,&rect);
00366 }

00369 CTrackToolBar::CTrackToolBar() {
00370         bStartOfScroll = TRUE;
00371         CDialogBar();
00372 }
00373 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00374 void CTrackToolBar::OnHScroll(UINT nSBCode, UINT nPos, CScrollBar* pScrollBar) 
00375 {
00376         //theApp.m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(WM_HSCROLL, MAKEWPARAM(nSBCode, nPos), (LPARAM)pScrollBar->m_hWnd); 
00377         CNewVisionDoc* doc = ((CNewVisionDoc*)((CMainFrame*)theApp.m_pMainWnd)->GetActiveDocument());
00378         if (!doc->trackermodel.IsInitialized())
00379         return;
00380 
00381         // Restore the state at the end and exit
00382     if (nSBCode == SB_ENDSCROLL)
00383     {
00384         bStartOfScroll = TRUE;
00385                 return;
00386     }
00387 
00388     // Pause when the scroll action begins.
00389     if (bStartOfScroll)
00390     {
00391         bStartOfScroll = FALSE;
00392     }
00393 
00394         // Get the minimum and maximum scroll-bar positions.
00395         int curpos = pScrollBar->GetScrollPos();
00396         int minpos;
00397         int maxpos;
00398         pScrollBar->GetScrollRange(&minpos, &maxpos);
00399         SCROLLINFO   info;
00400         pScrollBar->GetScrollInfo(&info, SIF_ALL);
00401         REFERENCE_TIME rtNew = doc->trackermodel.GetCurrentPosition();
00402         int line_step = (int) (1.0        * doc->trackermodel.m_frameTotal / (maxpos - minpos) );
00403         int page_step = (int) (info.nPage * doc->trackermodel.m_frameTotal / (maxpos - minpos) );
00404         switch (nSBCode)
00405         {
00406                 case SB_TOP:      
00407                         rtNew = 0;
00408                         break;
00409                 case SB_BOTTOM:     
00410                         rtNew = doc->trackermodel.m_frameTotal;
00411                         break;
00412                 case SB_LINEUP:      
00413                         rtNew = max(0, rtNew - line_step);
00414                         break;
00415                 case SB_LINEDOWN:   
00416                         rtNew = min(doc->trackermodel.m_frameTotal, rtNew + line_step);
00417                         break;
00418                 case SB_PAGEUP:    
00419                         rtNew = max(0, rtNew - page_step);
00420                         break;
00421                 case SB_PAGEDOWN:
00422                         rtNew = min(doc->trackermodel.m_frameTotal, rtNew + page_step);
00423                         break;
00424                 case SB_THUMBPOSITION: 
00425                         rtNew = (int) (1.0 * doc->trackermodel.m_frameTotal * nPos / (maxpos - minpos) );
00426                         break;
00427                 case SB_THUMBTRACK:
00428                         rtNew = (int) (1.0 * doc->trackermodel.m_frameTotal * nPos / (maxpos - minpos) );
00429         }    
00430         doc->trackermodel.SetPosition(rtNew);
00431         theApp.m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(WM_UPDATEACTIVEVIEW);
00432         theApp.m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(WM_UPDATENAVBAR);
00433         theApp.m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(WM_UPDATESTATUSBAR);
00434 }
00435 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00436 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00437 void CBlendToolBar::OnHScroll(UINT nSBCode, UINT nPos, CScrollBar* pScrollBar) {
00438         if (nSBCode == SB_ENDSCROLL) {
00439                 theApp.m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(WM_UPDATEACTIVEVIEW);
00440                 return;
00441         }
00442         CNewVisionDoc* doc = ((CNewVisionDoc*)((CMainFrame*)theApp.m_pMainWnd)->GetActiveDocument());
00443         if (doc->trackermodel.IsInitialized()) {
00444                 doc->trackermodel.SetTransparency(((CSliderCtrl*)(m_wndBlendToolBar.GetDlgItem(ID_SLIDER)))->GetPos());
00445         }
00446         CDialogBar::OnHScroll(nSBCode, nPos, pScrollBar);
00447 }
00448 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00449 void CZoomToolBar::OnHScroll(UINT nSBCode, UINT nPos, CScrollBar* pScrollBar) {
00450         if (nSBCode == SB_ENDSCROLL) {
00451                 theApp.m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(WM_UPDATEACTIVEVIEW);
00452                 return;
00453         }
00454         // get range here
00455         double minFactor = ((CMainFrame*)(theApp.m_pMainWnd))->GetActivePane()->m_minZoomFactor;
00456         double maxFactor = ((CMainFrame*)(theApp.m_pMainWnd))->GetActivePane()->m_maxZoomFactor;
00457         int minpos, maxpos;
00458         nPos = ((CSliderCtrl*)(m_wndZoomToolBar.GetDlgItem(IDC_ZOOMSLIDER)))->GetPos();
00459         ((CSliderCtrl*)(m_wndZoomToolBar.GetDlgItem(IDC_ZOOMSLIDER)))->GetRange(minpos, maxpos);
00460         double scale;
00461         const int CENTER = 100;
00462         if (nPos >= CENTER)
00463                 scale = 1+(maxFactor-1)*2*(nPos-CENTER)/maxpos;
00464         else
00465                 scale = 1+(minFactor-1)*2*(CENTER-nPos)/maxpos;
00466         ((CMainFrame*)(theApp.m_pMainWnd))->GetActivePane()->SetZoomScale(scale);
00467         CStatic* pos = (CStatic*)GetDlgItem(ID_ZOOM);
00468         TCHAR szZoom[6];
00469         StringCchPrintf(szZoom, 24, _T("%.2fX\0"), scale);
00470         pos->SetWindowText(szZoom);
00471         //((CMainFrame*)(theApp.m_pMainWnd))->GetActivePane()->OnHScroll(SB_ENDSCROLL, 0, NULL);
00472         ((CMainFrame*)(theApp.m_pMainWnd))->GetActivePane()->SetDisplaySize();
00473         ((CMainFrame*)(theApp.m_pMainWnd))->GetActivePane()->UpdateVideoPosition();
00474         theApp.m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(WM_UPDATEACTIVEVIEW);
00475         CDialogBar::OnHScroll(nSBCode, nPos, pScrollBar);
00476 }
